DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Ethanol Lock Solution Prevention Catheter Related Bloodstream Infection Patients Suffering Acute Renal Failure , Hospitalized Intensive Care Unit . A Multi-Center , Randomized , Versus Placebo , Double Blinded Clinical Trial
